name: FreestyleBeatBot--GPTgeneratedfreestyleraps
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: freestyle beat bot
des: This AI powered rapper knows how to rap and rhyme about any subject. When she says, "Gimme something," tell her what you want her to freestyle rap about. Keep it clean and friendly, otherwise she'll rap about polkadots, kittens or french fries. Freestyle Beatbot leverages brand-new OpenAI GPT 3.5 LLM technology to generate raps from your topic suggestions. It's different every time!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
